name: Keimling 3D
description:
Find hidden treasures in a dreamscape garden to keep it growing.

Keimling 3D is a simple first person game made in 14 days for the My First Game Jam: Winter 2023 with the theme: "growth".

I would encourage you to jump right in and explore on your own pace. If you find yourself searching the same places over and over without much luck, try looking for "golden" elements in the garden.


Some objects are more well hidden than others. Feel free to collect as many as you want. You will know when you have found the last one, but the main reward will remain your - hopefully pleasant - time in the garden.

I hope you enjoy it. This is my first 3D project, so if you play this I would love to read your thoughts.
